title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the quantum encryption system, including security standards, performance targets, integration with existing systems, and user needs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the quantum encryption system, including components, interfaces, and data flow.

title: Develop Quantum Key Distribution Protocol
description: Implement the quantum key distribution protocol for secure key exchange between parties.

title: Implement Encryption/Decryption Algorithms
description: Develop the encryption and decryption algorithms using the quantum-secure keys.

title: Design Secure User Interface and Communication Protocols
description: Design a secure and user-friendly interface for message exchange, along with robust communication protocols to ensure end-to-end encryption and integrity of transmitted data.

title: Develop Security Auditing and Monitoring
description: Implement security auditing and monitoring mechanisms to detect and respond to potential threats or attacks.

title: Set up Testing and Validation Environment
description: Establish a testing and validation environment for the quantum encryption system, including simulated attacks and performance benchmarking.

title: Develop Deployment and Integration Plan
description: Create a comprehensive plan for deploying and integrating the quantum encryption system with existing military communication infrastructure. The plan should cover the following key aspects: 1) Infrastructure requirements (hardware, software, network) 2) Integration points and interfaces with legacy systems 3) Deployment strategy (phased rollout, pilot testing) 4) Security and access control measures 5) Monitoring and maintenance processes 6) Training and documentation for personnel 7) Rollback and contingency plans

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, components, and usage instructions for the quantum encryption system.
